typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [Asset_ID],[Fund_ID]\nFROM [relational].[Asset]\nWHERE record_deleted_flag = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalAsset
ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@ValidDateAndIncidentID, RelationalAsset lookup(Derived_NonNull_ParentUID == Lkp_UID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupParentUID
LookupParentUID derive(Validation_Error = iif(isNull(Lkp_UID),toString('Question Parent relationship error'),toString(null()))) ~> ComputeValidationField
ComputeValidationField select(mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
ConvertDate split(not(isNull(Incident_Id)) && not(isNull(Derived_Reporting_Period)) && not(isNull(Incident_Date)),
	disjoint: false) ~> ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@(ValidDateAndIncidentID, InvalidDateOrIncidentID)
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Derived_Reporting_Period = toDate(Reporting_Period,"dd/MM/yyyy"),
		Derived_Incident_Date = toDate(Incident_Date,"dd/MM/yyyy")) ~> ConvertDate
InvalidDateOrIncidentIDerrormessage select(mapColumn(
		Asset_ID,
		Fund_ID,
		Incident_Id,
		Reporting_Period,
		Incident_Type_Code,
		Incident_Severity,
		Incident_Description,
		Investigation_Undertaken,
		Incident_Findings,
		Incident_Date,
		Validation_Error
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectInvalidDateOrIncidentID
ValidatedIncidentIDandDate@InvalidDateOrIncidentID derive(Validation_Error = toString("Invalid Reporting Period / Incident Date / Incident ID")) ~> InvalidDateOrIncidentIDerrormessage
RelationalAsset select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Asset_ID = Asset_ID,
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRelationalAsset
SelectColumns sink(input(
		Asset_ID as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Incident_Id as string,
		Reporting_Period as string,
		Incident_Type_Code as string,
		Incident_Severity as string,
		Incident_Description as string,
		Investigation_Undertaken as string,
		Incident_Findings as string,
		Incident_Date as string,
		Validation_Error as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UID,
		SLI_ID,
		Ops_Report_ID,
		Metric_Group,
		Metric_Sub_Group,
		Metric_Name,
		Requirement_Question,
		Parent_UID,
		Reference,
		Dimension,
		Reporting_Format,
		Report_Frequency,
		Active,
		Forest,
		Saw_Mill,
		Carbon,
		AUS,
		NZ,
		US,
		Malaysia,
		Indonesia,
		Validation_Error
	)) ~> StagingDB
